section.heading: Deferral or forgiveness of special assessments.
section.text: The Mayor may defer or forgive, in whole or in part, any special assessment levied by the District of Columbia with respect to any qualified real property approved pursuant to § 6-1503.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Oct. 20, 1988, D.C. Law 7-177, § 7, 35 DCR 6158

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Mayor authorized to issue rules: Section 13 of D.C. Law 7-177 provided that the Mayor shall issue rules to implement the provisions of the act.
